content: Hi, could anybody take a look at #14699, which defines differential rings and algebras, as well as some notation? Thanks
Do you have some further code that builds on top of this? It would be good to see how these definitions hold up under a bit of pressure.
For example, do you need more flexibility for the linear coefficients of the differential, or is Int always good enough (which is what you have right now).
Another question that I have: you have lemmas to transfer a differential and a differential algebra across (algebra) equivs. Do you need those in practice? How often?
